name: Repetition depending on the case of the last letter
instruction:
Write a function `repeatString` that takes a string.

Have the function take the last character of the string and repeat it.

If the last character is written in upper case, repeat it 3 times, if in lower case, repeat it 2 times.

An example of how to execute the function:
```javascript
repeatString('abc'); // 'cc'
repeatString('abc'); // 'CCC'
```
